Name: High-res gradient echo EPI and 3D GRASE data of auditory cortex
Acknowledgments: We thank An T. Vu, Federico De Martino, and Sebastian Schmitter for help in collecting the dataset.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite as Moerel, et al. (2018): https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuroimage.2017.03.063
